name: chemotherapy
description: The collection of data elements describing the details of a chemotherapy treatment regimen completed by a donor. To submit multiple treatment drugs for a single regimen, submit multiple rows in the chemotherapy file.

fields.name: program_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the ARGO program.

fields.name: submitter_donor_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider.

fields.name: submitter_treatment_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the treatment, as assigned by the data provider.

fields.name: drug_rxnormcui
fields.description: The unique RxNormID assigned to the treatment regimen drug.

meta.notes:
This field uses standardized vocabulary from the RxNorm database (https://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/rxnorm), provided by the NIH.

You can search for RX Norm values through the web interface (https://mor.nlm.nih.gov/RxNav/) or API (https://mor.nlm.nih.gov/download/rxnav/RxNormAPIs.html).

For example, to find the rxnormcui based on drug name, you can use: https://rxnav.nlm.nih.gov/REST/rxcui.json?name=leucovorin or https://mor.nlm.nih.gov/RxNav/search?searchBy=String&searchTerm=leucovorin

fields.name: drug_name
fields.description: Name of agent or drug administered to donor as part of the treatment regimen.

meta.notes:
This field uses standardized vocabulary from the RxNorm database (https://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/rxnorm), provided by the NIH.

You can search for RX Norm values through the web interface (https://mor.nlm.nih.gov/RxNav/) or API (https://mor.nlm.nih.gov/download/rxnav/RxNormAPIs.html).

For example, to find the rxnormcui based on drug name, you can use: https://rxnav.nlm.nih.gov/REST/rxcui.json?name=leucovorin or https://mor.nlm.nih.gov/RxNav/search?searchBy=String&searchTerm=leucovorin

fields.name: chemotherapy_drug_dose_units
fields.description: Indicate units used to record chemotherapy drug dose.

fields.name: prescribed_cumulative_drug_dose
fields.description: Indicate the total prescribed drug dose in the same units specified in chemotherapy_drug_dose_units.

meta.notes: Either the 'actual_cumulative_drug_dose' or the 'prescribed_cumulative_drug_dose' field must be submitted.

fields.name: actual_cumulative_drug_dose
fields.description: Indicate the total actual drug dose in the same units specified in chemotherapy_drug_dose_units.

meta.notes: Either the 'actual_cumulative_drug_dose' or the 'prescribed_cumulative_drug_dose' field must be submitted.

fields.name: dose_intensity_reduction
fields.description: Indicate if there was a significant reduction in dose intensity.

fields.name: dose_intensity_reduction_event
fields.description: If there was a signficiant reduction in dose intensity, indicate which event caused it.

meta.notes: This field should only be submitted if 'dose_intensity_reduction' is 'Yes'

fields.name: dose_intensity_reduction_amount
fields.description: If there was a significant reduction in dose intensity, indicate the amount.

meta.notes: This field should only be submitted if 'dose_intensity_reduction' is 'Yes'
